articles.title: Petrol, diesel prices hiked for the 16th time in May. Check rates in Delhi, Mumbai - Mint
articles.description: In Delhi, a litre of petrol will cost you  ₹94.23 and a litre of diesel will cost  ₹85.15.
articles.content: The prices of petrol and diesel were hiked again in Delhi on Monday, for the 16th time since 4 May, by 29 paise and 26 paise respectively, according to Indian Oil Corporation.
